00043 #ifndef _LUSTRE_REQ_LAYOUT_H__

00045 
00051 struct req_msg_field;
00052 struct req_format;
00053 struct req_capsule;
00054 
00055 struct ptlrpc_request;
00056 
00057 enum req_location {
00058         RCL_CLIENT,
00059         RCL_SERVER,
00060         RCL_NR
00061 };
00062 
00063 /* Maximal number of fields (buffers) in a request message. */
00064 #define REQ_MAX_FIELD_NR  9
00065 
00066 struct req_capsule {
00067         struct ptlrpc_request   *rc_req;
00068         const struct req_format *rc_fmt;
00069         enum req_location        rc_loc;
00070         __u32                    rc_area[RCL_NR][REQ_MAX_FIELD_NR];
00071 };
00072 
00073 #if !defined(__REQ_LAYOUT_USER__)
00074 
00075 /* struct ptlrpc_request, lustre_msg* */
00076 #include <lustre_net.h>
00077 
00078 void req_capsule_init(struct req_capsule *pill, struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00079                       enum req_location location);
00080 void req_capsule_fini(struct req_capsule *pill);
00081 
00082 void req_capsule_set(struct req_capsule *pill, const struct req_format *fmt);
00083 void req_capsule_client_dump(struct req_capsule *pill);
00084 void req_capsule_server_dump(struct req_capsule *pill);

00087                                 enum req_location loc);

00120                          enum req_location loc);

00122
